info.author: Vivian De Smedt
info.description:
This script mimics rsync. It is a sort of advanced version of xcopy. Its aim is
to selectively synchronize folders. More precisely it copy selective parts of a
folder to a destination folder and in addition can remove parts of the
destination folder that do not correspond to parts of the original folder.
info.name: rsync.py
info.summary: Python port of rsync. Should help to synchronize folders.
info.html_description: This script mimics rsync. It is a sort of advanced version of xcopy. Its aim is to selectively synchronize folders. More precisely it copy selective parts of a folder to a destination folder and in addition can remove parts of the destination folder that do not correspond to parts of the original folder.
